body.p:
To His Excelency Thomas E Bramlet
Govenor of Kentucky
Your Petitioner Alexander T Huston, respectfully represents that at the last March Term 1865 of the Madison Circuit Court he was convicted in two cases of Keeping a Tipling House

He has not for two years, dealt in Liquors, nor does he intend to do so again -- He is a very poor man with a wife & four children, and it will be very hard upon him to pay all of both Judgments & cost
He asks that you remit said fines except the Attorneys fee & costs
We the undersigned citizens of Madison County Ky Join in the prayer of the above Petition

H. Doolin
R. G. Burton
Thos Ranland
Wm C. Allison,
P P Ballard
J. W Caperton
W H Francis
John. G. Taylor
Wm E. Luxor
J W Harcourt
T. D. Andrews
R H Johnson
W. M. Stone

(Madison Co
Refused
Richard T. Jacob
Lt. & act Governor
A. T Huston
